body.name: Premium Handblock Cotton Napkin Set of 12 - Exquisite Design and Quality Handmade 16 inch X 16 Inch Set of 12 for Dinner
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 19 hrs 59 mins
features: Table Napkins (Quality With Quantity) : our Handblock Cotton Napkin Set of 12, a premium collection of exquisitely designed and meticulously crafted napkins that elevate your dining experience. Made from high-quality cotton fabric, these napkins are soft, durable, and perfect for everyday use or special occasions.

Assorted Multi-Color Designs : Each napkin in the set features a beautiful handblock print, created by skilled artisans using traditional techniques. The intricate patterns and vibrant colors add a touch of elegance and sophistication to your table setting, making every meal a memorable one.

Available Size : 16 Inch X 16 Inch , these napkins are generously sized to provide ample coverage and functionality. Whether you're hosting a dinner party, enjoying a casual meal with your family, or setting up a stylish table for a special event, these napkins effortlessly elevate the ambiance.

Unique Pattern : The handblock printing process ensures that each napkin is unique, with slight variations in pattern placement and color, making them truly one-of-a-kind. The attention to detail and craftsmanship shines through in every stitch and print, reflecting the rich cultural heritage of traditional handblock printing.

Care With Love : Not only are these napkins aesthetically pleasing, but they are also practical and easy to care for. They are Hand and machine washable, allowing for convenient cleaning and maintenance.

Make Impression On Your Guest : Enhance your dining experience and impress your guests with our Handblock Cotton Napkin Set of 12. Perfect for adding a touch of charm and sophistication to any table setting. Order yours today and embrace the beauty of handcrafted elegance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Premium Quality Material Authentic Rajasthani Craftsmanship And Vibrant Floral Patterns Each napkin is meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans in Rajasthan, India. The age-old technique of handblock printing is used to create intricate floral designs on the soft cotton fabric, showcasing the artistry and creativity of the region. Immerse yourself in the beauty of nature with our stunning floral patterns. The delicate motifs, inspired by Rajasthani flora, are meticulously handblock printed using natural dyes, resulting in vibrant colors that are both eye-catching and long-lasting. We believe in providing you with the best, which is why our table napkins are made from high-quality cotton fabric. The blend of cotton ensures durability, softness, and easy maintenance, allowing you to enjoy these napkins for years to come.

Premium Quality Material Enhance Your Dining Décor And Make a Statement The Rajasthani Handblock Floral Pattern Table Napkins effortlessly blend traditional craftsmanship with modern style. Whether you have a rustic farmhouse theme or a contemporary dining space, these napkins will complement any décor and create a visually pleasing and inviting atmosphere. Our Rajasthani Handblock Floral Pattern Table Napkins are not just functional; they are a statement of your refined taste and appreciation for exquisite craftsmanship. Impress your guests with these unique and beautiful napkins, and let them experience the richness of Rajasthani culture. Indulge in the beauty and artistry of Rajasthani handblock printing with our Floral Pattern Table Napkins. Add a touch of elegance and sophistication to your dining experience and create unforgettable memories. Elevate your table settings with these exquisite napkins and let the charm of Rajasthan grace your home.

Unique Multicolor Floral Dinner Napkin Elevate your dining experience with our Rajasthani Handblock Floral Pattern Table Napkins. Crafted with utmost care and precision, these 16x16 inch napkins are a true testament to the rich heritage of Rajasthani handblock printing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was nervous that these napkins would have a slick feel, but after washing they are just as I hoped. Comfortable cotton. Charming style. I leave them out in a clear pitcher for a quick grab. One of my favorite purchases!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Here's the thing. I read the reviews and took a chance, because for the price I don't expect much. They are smaller than a standard napkin and the cloth is thin, but they are super cute and we really like them. I think of this as more of an every day/lunch type napkin vs. napkins I'd use at a dinner party. If you want thick, big napkins don't order these. But for the price these are just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are luncheon napkins.
reviews.reviewText: Theyre fun and pretty. Thin yes but thats ok. Perfect for a luncheon, shower or tea party.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely for daily use
reviews.reviewText: These arrived with a chemical-like smell which had me worried. However after two washes it went away and became sooo soft! Beautiful napkins!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not too big or too small. Be aware these are only a single ply fabric so they are pretty thin and not very absorbent. I probably wouldn’t have purchased if I knew how thin they were however I will keep as they are very pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very thin cloth
reviews.reviewText: The first thing to come to mind every time you grab them is how thin they are. I'd rather use a paper towel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We love the prints these napkins. I haven’t dried in the dryer, so the haven’t shrunk. They can be quite wrinkled from being air dried, but nothing I can’t live with. I do not miss disposable napkins at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ideal for everyday family use
reviews.reviewText: These are great for every day, run of the mill, family dinner usage - They absorb reasonably well, they're reasonably good at holding up to stains and wrinkles after a couple of washes, and the patterns are distracting enough if there is a small stain. I wouldn't call them elegant or classy, and wouldn't think to use them for say, a fancy dinner party or a holiday, but they're great for the everyday to replace paper napkins!
